original_text: Because you push with side and shoulder, and thrust at all the weak with your horns, till you have scattered them abroad,
korean_text: 너희가 옆구리와 어깨로 밀어뜨리고 모든 병든 자를 뿔로 받아 무리를 밖으로 흩어지게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: Because you push with side and shoulder,
and thrust at all the weak with your horns,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 뿔로 모든 약한 자들을 찌르고,

sentences.original_text: till you have scattered them abroad,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그들을 밖으로 흩어 버릴 때까지,
